subject: Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?

Exactamundo, Ann! 

Nothings stopping us that are activily involved investigating haunted

If it does work, helping earth bound spirits to discuss their 
predicament, and eventually crossover, would be a win win win 
situation!
